<p>Tests that accessing Attr after its Element has been destroyed works without crashing.</p><p>On success, you will see a series of "<span class="pass">PASS</span>" messages, followed by "<span class="pass">TEST COMPLETE</span>".</p>
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> attributes.length is 1</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> attributes[0] is attributes.item(0)</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> attributes.getNamedItem('a') is attributes.item(0)</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> attributes.item(0).name is 'a'</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> attributes.item(0).specified is true</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> attributes.item(0).value is 'b'</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> attributes.item(0).ownerElement.tagName is 'P'</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> attributes.item(0).value is 'c'</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> attributes.length is 0</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> attr.name is 'a'</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> attr.specified is true</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> attr.value is 'b'</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> attr.ownerElement.tagName is 'P'</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> attr.value is 'c'</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> successfullyParsed is true</span><br />
<br /><span class="pass">TEST COMPLETE</span><br />
